page.title: 03MODEL RAILWAY CLUB
page.content: Gainsborough Model Railway Club is one of the most famous in ENGLAND. It meets in the former Holy Trinity school in Florence Terrace.It has one of the biggest model railway layout in the world .The railway is a scale model of the old LNER Main line from Kings cross to Leeds. It has over 70 Locomotives.It has 200 coaches and freight wagons and 12 signal boxes.All locomotives and rolling stock have been hand built by members.All are painted in either BR or LNER liveries. Each year the Club opens its doors to the general public to enable them to see this large and interesting display.The names of some of the trains that can be seen are Flying Scotsman,Silver Jubilee,Coronation, West Riding Limited,and Yorkshire Pullman.
